price: 269. (Al-lah) concede sabiduría a quien quiere. Y quien la recibe ha obtenido un gran bien. Pero solo lo recuerdan (y se benefician de la exhortación) los hombres de buen juicio.
arabic: يُؤۡتِي ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُؤۡتَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ فَقَدۡ أُوتِيَ خَيۡرٗا كَثِيرٗاۗ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلَّآ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yu'tī al-ḥik'mata man yashāu waman yu'ta al-ḥik'mata faqad ūtiya khayran kathīran wamā yadhakkaru illā ulū al-albābi
